# Onis
Large, horned people that come in a variety of colors. Their accuracy with guns is terrible, but their physical strength brings them a lot of boons both in and out of combat.
## Diet - Just about anything. Can even eat many things raw. Booze is a favorite.
## Benefits - They take [color=#1e90ff]20% less Blunt, Slash, and Piercing damage[/color]. - Does more damage in melee; 25% more Blunt, Slash, Piece, Stamina, and Structural damage. - Due to their big size, they can easily carry and pull any other species. - They heal brute damage by drinking booze, and are far harder to get drunk - Slightly more stamina than Humans.
## Drawbacks - Oni are unable to fire any weapons but shotguns with accuracy, with reports of bullets managing to fire even behind them - They are harder to carry and pull. - They are bigger than Humans, making them easier to hit. - Sources of holy damage are their bane, and will injure them greatly
